name: Dance Dandelion
description:
Blow into the windmill (to your microphone) to start.

Move your cursor and blow the dandelion.

If the microphone is not detected, please check if the microphone is allowed or refresh the page and try again (or download the win build). 

No win condition, just light up your journey. 

[Class Assignment for Prototype Studio-Week1-Sink or Swim]
